name: Plant Based Reusable Cups
description: Barista's love it!Easy to clean, hassle free and Plant Based.Sourced from local farmers, plant residue from Bamboo, Wheat, Rice, and Barley is processed and molded into reusable cups which can be used hundreds of times.
comment: So, every batch is unique, Just. Like. You.

features.feature_one: Every batch of cups is unique due to being natural.
features.feature_four: Govt Approved, Tested, and approved in TUV, Germany
features.feature_seven: Odorless tasteless and doesn’t react with hot beverages

care_guide.guide_two: Place the cup and the lid separately on top shelf of the dishwasher.

do_list.one: Rinse the cup and the lids thoroughly.
do_list.two: Dispose them into a Recycle bin.

name: Sustainability Starter Kit
description: This starter kit is all you need to start the revolution.

consist_elemnets.element_two: 1 Plant Based Reusable Cup with 2 lids

name: Reusable Bamboo Straws
description: We collaborated with artisans in Veitnam, Earthly Organic Bamboo Straws are 100% Compostable, Vegan and BPA free. They can be reused, thrown in a compost bin, or even in your backyard. Serve with cold beverages like ice tea, cold coffee and many more.

features.feature_one: Govt Approved, Tested, and approved in TUV Rhineland, Germany
features.feature_four: Govt Approved, Tested, and approved in TUV, Germany
features.feature_seven: Odorless tasteless and doesn’t react with hot beverages

care_guide.guide_one: Wash it with clean water under the tap.
care_guide.guide_three: Boil in water for a few minutes.

name: Natural Bamboo Loofah
description: Natural loofah sponges actually come from the fruits of vine-growing Luffa plants. These plants are part of the gourd family (Cucurbitaceae) making them relatives of watermelons, cucumbers and pumpkins.When a luffa fruit dries out and is peeled, you are left with its fibrous interior, which can be used as a sponge.It is biodegradable and is an organic, eco-friendly exfoliating body scrubber. Both men and women can use it, suitable for shower and bathtub.

features.feature_one: Plant-based material; Better for the skin - No Chemicals
features.feature_two: Exfoliation - Removing dead skin cells not only improves the look of your skin, it also sweeps away places where bacteria and soil could collect.
features.feature_three: Improving Circulation - Unlike harshly abrasive scrubbers and sponges, a loofah's firm but elastic fibers are round in cross section and are less likely to scratch skin

care_guide.guide_one: Wet the loofah or soak it in water
care_guide.guide_three: Boil in water for a few minutes.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush (set of 2)
description: Earthly Bamboo Toothbrush are BPA free, Biodegradable and have charcoal infused bristles that help remove stains effectively. We guarantee your satisfaction. See for yourself!

features.feature_one: Plant-based material; Better for the skin - No Chemicals

name: Plant Based Reusable Containers
description: Sourced from local farmers, plant residue from Bamboo, Wheat, Rice, and Barley is processed and molded into reusable containers which can be used hundreds of times. Microwave safe, seal proof, and sturdy, they are perfect to store snacks or lunch.Designed in USA. Tested in Germany.

features.feature_two: Govt Approved, Tested and approved in TUV Rhineland Germany

care_guide.guide_one: Can be reused hundreds of times. Just wash under a tap or in a dishwasher.
